channel.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
channel.description:
Hey,
I tried adding Torva to my 317 Delta, but the client doesn't won't compile correctly. The server side compiled without errors but I always keep getting errors, (100, 54, 52, 3, or 2 errors). Tried alot of things but I dunno what I'm doing wrong.
This is what I get when compiling:
[code]Class8.java:5: error: class, interface, or enum expected if(i == 18354) // change this if you need to "item number" ^ Class8.java:8: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option ^ Class8.java:9: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; ^ Class8.java:10: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; ^ Class8.java:11: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072; ^ Class8.java:12: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; ^ Class8.java:13: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550; ^ Class8.java:14: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; ^ Class8.java:15: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt174 = 14148; //Model ID ^ Class8.java:16: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller ^ Class8.java:17: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from yo u ^ Class8.java:18: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circl e ^ Class8.java:19: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right ^ Class8.java:20: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up ^ Class8.java:21: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt165 = 14147;//male wearing ^ Class8.java:22: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt200 = 14146;//female wearing ^ Class8.java:23: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt164 = 14146;//Female arms/sleeves ^ Class8.java:24: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt188 = 14147;//male arms/sleeves ^ Class8.java:25: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable ^ Class8.java:26: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aString170 = "Torva platebody";//Name of the new item ^ Class8.java:27: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aByteArray178 = "Provides excellent protection".getBytes();//examin info ^ Class8.java:28: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ Class8.java:32: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; ^ Class8.java:33: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt174 = 14150; ^ Class8.java:34: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt165 = 10110; ^ Class8.java:35: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt200 = 14149; ^ Class8.java:36: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt188 = -1; ^ Class8.java:37: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt164 = -1; ^ Class8.java:38: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt181 = 2151; ^ Class8.java:39: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt190 = 429; ^ Class8.java:40: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt198 = 1189; ^ Class8.java:41: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt194 = 5; ^ Class8.java:42: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aString170 = "Torva platelegs"; ^ Class8.java:43: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Torva platelegs".getBytes(); ^ Class8.java:44: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ Class8.java:47: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; ^ Class8.java:48: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ^ Class8.java:49: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; ^ Class8.java:50: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; ^ Class8.java:51: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; ^ Class8.java:52: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt174 = 14153;//item look ^ Class8.java:53: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt181 = 700; ^ Class8.java:54: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt190 = 1100; ^ Class8.java:55: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt198 = 650; ^ Class8.java:56: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt204 = 1148; ^ Class8.java:57: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt169 = 5; ^ Class8.java:58: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt194 = -25; ^ Class8.java:59: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt165 = 14151; ^ Class8.java:60: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.anInt200 = 14152; ^ Class8.java:61: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aString170 = "Torva full helm "; ^ Class8.java:62: error: class, interface, or enum expected class8.aByteArray178 = "A ancient warior's full helm.".getBytes(); ^ Class8.java:63: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 52 errors[/code]
I did EVERY step from this tut: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=532549.0
If someone knows a fix, please let me know.
Regards, Derpington

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

i used spaces cus you can’t “TAB” on here, which is a major downside to moparscape forums. In the link is the coding using tabs which is better to use anyway

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @ottkid2 ottkid2
item.description:
@ottkid2 wrote:

okay ik whats wrong if you go to your item.cfg when u put the code in for torva
the person used spaces delete all the spaces and press “tab” once on each. it should take errors out.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

[quote=“Derpington, post:5, topic:433351”]Then go to item.cfg and paste this code

item = 18354	Torva_platebody	An_Ancient_warrior's_Platebody.	5000	5000	5000	4	4	4	-31	-11	156	140	120	-10	160	10	10
item = 18356	Torva_Full_helm	An_Ancient_warrior's_full_helm.	5000	5000	5000	0	0	0	-7	-3	68	73	65	-2	74	3	1
item = 18355	Torva_platelegs	An_Ancient_warrior's_platelegs.	5000	5000	5000	0	0	0	-21	-8	112	100	95	-5	125	2	1

Now go to item.java and paste the id’s in the right places.(if u cant do this i’m not helping.)

Checked the ID’s, also the ID’s in Item.java.
I have put:
18354 in the list of platebodies
18356 in the list of full helmets
and 18355 in the list of legs.

This is my item.cfg:[code]

item = 18354 Torva_platebody An_Ancient_warrior’s_Platebody. 5000 5000 5000 4 4 4 -31 -11 156 140 120 -10 160 10 10
item = 18356 Torva_Full_helm An_Ancient_warrior’s_full_helm. 5000 5000 5000 0 0 0 -7 -3 68 73 65 -2 74 3 1
item = 18355 Torva_platelegs An_Ancient_warrior’s_platelegs. 5000 5000 5000 0 0 0 -21 -8 112 100 95 -5 125 2 1
[/code]

And to make it work without the outofbounds error, i added 1 zero after each last number so, after the “10”, after the “1”, and after the second “1”.

Checked everything, I don’t know what’s wrong

(somehow the codes look messed up in my post, but imagine them with tabs.[/quote]
so you used tabs on this part?

Read full topic

@202685 wrote:

i did the tut. DELETE YOUR .GZ MODLES!!! it should run fin if u do so

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

the item IDs are wrong. Re-Check them.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:7, topic:433288”]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)
I believe that’s the error your normally get when you add items to your item.cfg incorrectly. You may have used spaces instead of tabs, or possibly entered too many or too few values. Double check your latest additions to item.cfg.[/quote]
He prob didn’t tab…

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)
I believe that’s the error your normally get when you add items to your item.cfg incorrectly. You may have used spaces instead of tabs, or possibly entered too many or too few values. Double check your latest additions to item.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

There is something else you did wrong then now.

Did you spawn the item and it did that? Cause now it seems that this is a server sided issue.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Failed to add Torva
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[code=java] public static final Class8 method198(int i)
{
for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++)
{
if(aClass8Array172[j].anInt157 == i)
{
return aClass8Array172[j];
}
}

    anInt180 = (anInt180 + 1) % 10;
    Class8 class8 = aClass8Array172[anInt180];
    aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i];
    class8.anInt157 = i;
    class8.method197();
    class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);

if(i == 18354) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925;
class8.anInt174 = 14148; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 14147;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14146;//female wearing
class8.anInt164 = 14146;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = 14147;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Torva platebody”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “Provides excellent protection”.getBytes();//examin info
}
if(i == 18355)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 14150;
class8.anInt165 = 10110;
class8.anInt200 = 14149;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt181 = 2151;
class8.anInt190 = 429;
class8.anInt198 = 1189;
class8.anInt194 = 5;
class8.aString170 = “Torva platelegs”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A pair of Torva platelegs”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 18356){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;
class8.anInt174 = 14153;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 700;
class8.anInt190 = 1100;
class8.anInt198 = 650;
class8.anInt204 = 1148;
class8.anInt169 = 5;
class8.anInt194 = -25;
class8.anInt165 = 14151;
class8.anInt200 = 14152;
class8.aString170 = "Torva full helm ";
class8.aByteArray178 = “A ancient warior’s full helm.”.getBytes();
}

    if(class8.anInt163 != -1)
    {
        class8.method199((byte)61);
		Class8_1.boltsAndArrows(i);
    }
    if(!aBoolean182 && class8.aBoolean161)
    {
        class8.aString170 = "Members Object";
        class8.aByteArray178 = "Login to a members' server to use this object.".getBytes();
        class8.aStringArray168 = null;
        class8.aStringArray189 = null;
        class8.anInt202 = 0;
    }
    return class8;
}[/code]

Try that.

Replace public static final Class8 method198(int i) With the one I posted.
